header.title: Hablar es fácil.
header.subTitle: Yo desarrollo y programo cosas sencillas, y amo lo que hago.

bio.title: Hola, soy Jared Larios
bio.subTitle: Programar no solo se trata de cómo se ve, ¡sino de cómo funciona!
bio.text: He seguido mi sueño de ser un desarrollador. Soy un tatlentoso desarrollador Full-Stack Jr con experiencia en TI. Al trabajar como freelancer, He tenido oportunidad de desarrollar mis habilidades al colaborar con pequeñas empresas y al crear contenido útil para las mismas.
bio.text2: Soy proactivo, autodidacta, curioso, innovador y constantemente busco como poner a prueba mis habilidades.

header.title: Talk is cheap.
header.subTitle: I develop and code dope and useful things, and I love what I do.

bio.title: Hello, I'm Jared Larios
bio.subTitle: Code is not just what it looks like. Code is how it works!
bio.text: I have proceeded my dream to be a developer as it has been my lifelong ambition. I am a talented Full-Stack developer Jr with a TI background. During my time working as a freelancer, I had the opportunity to enhace my expertise by collaborating with different small business and by creating useful content for business.
bio.text2: I am proactive, self-reliant, autodidactic, quietly curious, innovative and constantly challenging my skills.
